achievements: Presented numerous cooking and food-related shows on the BBC.
Won a BAFTA for her documentary 'The Secret Life of the Pie'.
Known for her vibrant personality and passion for food.
Known for presenting children's television shows like 'Live & Kicking'.
Presented various other programmes including game shows and travel documentaries.
Won a BAFTA for his work on the series 'The Krypton Factor'.
